UpdateSourceArgs: -c "cd foundry-vtt/server && if [[ ! -f {{app}} ]]; then echo \"You must specify a Node.js version (not Linux version) of the Foundry VTT server for AMP to install under Server Download URL in AMP's settings, and select the Server Version accordingly. Aborting\" && exit 1; else exit 0; fi"

-NoProfile -Command "Set-Location -Path 'foundry-vtt/server'; if (!(Test-Path '{{app}}')) { Write-Host \"You must specify a Node.js version (not Windows version) of the Foundry VTT server for AMP to install under Server Download URL in AMP's settings, and select the Server Version accordingly. Aborting\"; exit 1 } else { exit 0 }"
